Articles.Content:
Immediately upon entering the Launchpad I get an error in my debug log:

"Ignore collision failed: Both colliders need to be activated when calling this ignore collision."

I suspect this may have something to do with the engine fairing I just added to the part I've been working on, since I've never seen it before.

I am in a very stripped down install of KSP, minimum of stock parts, plus the ones I am working on. No plugins are loaded.

What might I have done wrong?
Well, I had added a collider to the fairing, mainly because I saw in the log that KSP was making one for it. I took it out and the error went away.
